As you walked to the arena, you chatted to Craig about his day, and you began to forget the weirdness of the situation for you and you just went with it. It felt good pretending to be someone else, in another body and another place - even if that other someone was a very pregnant sister of your crush. You waddled over to your seat and sat down. You felt what could only be described as maternal instincts towards your bump - the way you cradled it and held it were the giveaway - and somewhere in the back of your mind, you were starting to wonder if Craig might be good father material. "So let's summarize," Brooke counts on her fingers. "He's reasonably well off if he can drop tickets for marquee boxing matches, he's open to dating a single mother, he's a gentleman, and most importantly he's a tall hunk who would definitely rock Brianna's world!" She grins salaciously.

"You are, in a way..." You admit, glancing downward. "Hey, can I ask you a couple of questions about Brianna?"

"Why not ask her yourself?" She retorts, then winces. "Sorry, that was rude. Of course I'll answer to the best of my knowledge."

"Okay," You begin, "Why do my nipples feel really sensitive? Not to mention my boobs have started to ache over the past several hours and I don't know why."

"That's because Brianna is lactating, plus it looks like she's gained a cup size over the past week or two." Explains Brooke. "Didn't you feel that way when you swapped with Erica? It's basic biology, pregnant and post-birth mothers have to deal with it. You don't think babies feed on steak and champagne right out of the womb, do you?"

"No, it just feels weird is all." You cup your boobs gently. Finding it amazing that they were filling up with milk in anticipation of feeding the life inside of you. "Question two: How did Brianna get pregnant? What happened to the father of this baby?"

Brooke frowned. "I haven't actually asked Bri about that, but I've heard bits and pieces from Mom and Dad. Apparently the guy was some kind of deadbeat, with whom she had a one-night stand several months ago. When he learnt she was pregnant he dumped her and disappeared."

Brooke glances down. "Yeah, that sounds difficult. But at least she has family to look after her just in case. You're a really great guy, did you know that?"

You look into each others' eyes, lean in and kiss. It felt amazing finally getting to kiss your crush, up close enough to smell the flowery conditioner in her hair and taste her lips in yours. After a few seconds, you come up for air.

"Let's head back up to the room. I wanna get plenty of sleep for tomorrow. I might meet up with Craig again for more fun."

"Say no more, sister dear!" Brooke jibes playfully. "You'll have to keep me informed about everything when you get back, just like we did here tonight."

Tomorrow...

info.brief_description: A body swap story with a bowl.
info.description:
You are John, an seventeen year old boy who was busy in the attic when you come across a special bowl, with a bottle of water next to it. What's special about the the bowl is that if two persons drink from it they will switch bodies with each other.

These are the characters:

You (John) 17 years: An average boy, you are a junior at your local high school. You're not popular nor a loser, you have managed to avoid taking a side. You're handsome, but not having the courage to ask a girl out. Always had an interest in the paranormal, you are searching in the attic if there is something nice for in your room.

Your mom (Tracy) 42 years: Your mom is a house-wife, while having a part-time job working as nurse at the hospital. She's a bit worried about you with your obsession with the paranormal. She has D-cups.

Your dad (Gerry) 40 years: Your dad is working as a construction worker, since it's a heavy job your dad and you don't spend too much time together. But when you both do have some time, you and your dad go to the park, watching the girls jogging.

Your older sister (Carmen) 22 years: Your older sister is a student at the university studying social studies. Since it's summer she's over at your family's home, saving some money. Little do your parents know that she's wild partier, even willingly neglecting her studies. You and her don't always get along, only when it's party time you both enjoy each other's company. She doesn't have a permanent boyfriend. She has C-cups.

Your younger sister (Stacy) 15 years old: Your younger sister studies in junior high. When she was younger she was bullied, she doesn't have much friends. She is shy but has a best friend, Linda who is the opposite of her. You three are good friends as you enjoy each other's company. Stacy has B-cups.

Your eldest sister (Erica) 24 years old: Your older sister was an 'accident' of your parents, they were carried away if you believe the stories of of her .Following her parents example she tried to settle too, but the guy dumped her leaving her. She now lives by herself and her newborn baby, Melody. She often comes over which you always like. She has D-cups.

Feel free to add characters, like friends and other relatives.

These are the rules:

1. Please write from second person.

2. Try to use good grammar and spelling, use the spell check if needed.

3. Sex,(normal, gay or lesbian) is fine. But don't make them do it with each other out of the blue.

4. I'll reserve my right to edit chapters, I'll only edit if the story doesn't make any sense or if it contains obvious grammatical errors.

5. PLEASE ADD!!!

6. Have fun!
